headline: Edwards Lifesciences Announces $500 Million Accelerated Share Repurchase
summary: IRVINE, Calif., August 19, 2025--Edwards Lifesciences (NYSE: EW) today announced that it has executed an accelerated share repurchase agreement ("ASR") to repurchase $500 million of Edwards’ common stock. With this transaction, Edwards has repurchased more than $800 million of shares in 2025.
